summary_text: Married insurance adjuster John Forbes falls for femme fatale Mona Stevens while her boyfriend is in jail and all suffer serious consequences as a result.

name: First Born
summary_text: A pregnant couple buys a mansion and moves out of NYC. Strange things start happening to the C-sectioned, anxious, new mom.

name: Looking for Comedy in the Muslim World
summary_text: To improve its relations with Muslim countries, the United States government sends comedian Albert Brooks to south Asia to write a report on what makes followers of Islam laugh.

name: Walking and Talking
summary_text: Just as Amelia thinks she's over her anxiety and insecurity, her best friend announces her engagement, bringing her anxiety and insecurity right back.

name: Börü
summary_text: Picking up from the explosive cliffhanger of the sixth episode of the miniseries, the film follows the harrowing coup attempt night of July 15th, and the Police Special Operations and ...                See full summary »

name: Ghost Graduation
summary_text: A teacher with paranormal abilities helps a group of ghosts graduate high school.

name: Passion of Mind
summary_text: A psychological romantic thriller where fantasy and reality become indistinguishable for a woman leading a double life in her dreams.

name: House of the Long Shadows
summary_text: An American author finds a dilapidated Welsh manor perfect for writing until the residents host a bizarre family reunion.

name: Eklavya: The Royal Guard
summary_text: As the kingdom of Devigarh comes apart at the seams, an aging bodyguard attempts to protect the Royal Family, as well as keep its darkest secrets from ever coming to light.

name: The Third Miracle
summary_text: The Vatican sends a priest to verify some miracles, performed by a woman who has been nominated for sainthood. During his investigation, the priest, who is experiencing a crisis of faith, re-discovers his own purpose in life.

name: The Valachi Papers
summary_text: Gangster Joe Valachi is a marked man in the same joint where mob boss Don Vito Genovese is imprisoned and he's forced to co-operate with the DA in exchange for protection.

name: Strategic Air Command
summary_text: An ex-pilot and current baseballer is recalled into the U.S. Air Force and assumes an increasingly important role in Cold War deterrence.

name: Woman on the Run
summary_text: Frank Johnson becomes an eyewitness to a murder. He's pursued around San Francisco by his wife, the police, and the killer.

name: Bayi Toplantisi
summary_text: Three men going through difficult periods in their lives, intersect at a dealer meeting. After a series of unexpected events, they find themselves caught in a crazy plan.

name: The Badge
summary_text: Sheriff Hardwick investigates the death of Mona, a transexual woman. The judge asks that the case is archived to prevent it impacting the upcoming elections, but the evidence keeps coming in.

name: 96 Minutes
summary_text: The story of 4 lives slammed together in a shocking moment. Intercutting between a carjacking and the separate stories of the 4 kids in Atlanta, we watch as they hurtle toward a life-changing end.

name: Hatuna Meuheret
summary_text: Zaza is a 31-year old Israeli bachelor, handsome and intelligent, and his family wants to see him married. But tradition dictates that Zaza has to choose a young virgin. She must be ...                See full summary »

name: Barney's Great Adventure
summary_text: A talking purple dinosaur leads a group of children on a hunt for a large missing egg.

name: Where the Day Takes You
summary_text: King is a young man, but he's already a veteran of life on the streets of Los Angeles. The leader of a group of runaways, King acts as a mentor to troubled kids such as gay hustler Little J and junkie Greg.

name: Apsolutnih sto
summary_text: Igor Gordic was an Olympic Champion in shooting, but now he is a junky without money and in debts to mafia. Sasa is his younger brother and he is getting ready for the next World ...                See full summary »

name: The Creature Walks Among Us
summary_text: A scientist captures the Creature and turns him into an air-breather, only for him to escape and start killing.

name: Cute & Dangerous
summary_text: Zelis is about to start a marriage she does not want, in a world she does not belong.

name: Hole in One
summary_text: Eric, a highly-gifted golfer but radically-undisciplined college undergrad, finds his world drastically altered after losing a golf bet to a pair of sadistic plastic surgeons. Eric's ...                See full summary »

name: Joker
summary_text: Mannar Mannan, an ordinary villager, decides to call himself the president of the country and starts fighting against the injustices he comes across in his society. What's his agenda?

name: Sleeping Dogs Lie
summary_text: A recently engaged woman's life is thrown into turmoil after confessing to her fiancé that she once experimented with bestiality.

name: Dialogue avec mon jardinier
summary_text: A successful artist, weary of Parisian life and on the verge of divorce, returns to the country to live in his childhood house. He needs someone to make a real vegetable garden again out of...                See full summary »

name: Metroland
summary_text: The sudden reappearance of his best friend Toni, after a ten year absence, causes Chris to remember his past, to question some of his lifestyle decisions and to re-evaluate his life and marriage to Marion.

name: Sister My Sister
summary_text: Two sisters separated in childhood reunite years later as servants at a household in France. Their happiness to be reunited spirals into an incestuous relationship.

name: Koizora
summary_text: Mika is a fresh high school student who starts texting a mysterious boy. She is shocked when he reveals who he is - Hiro, a delinquent attending her school. What she doesn't know is that Hiro isn't as bad as he seems.

name: The Outfit
summary_text: Earl Macklin robs a bank owned by the mob, serves his prison time and is released, only to start a private war against the crime outfit that owned the bank.

name: Godspell
summary_text: An adaption of the musical, in a modern-day song-and-dance recreation of the Gospel of St. Matthew.

name: King Lear
summary_text: An aging King invites disaster when he abdicates to his corrupt, toadying daughters, and rejects his loving and honest one.

name: Dakota Skye
summary_text: A girl with the supernatural ability to see through other peoples' lies, falls in love with a mysterious boy who always tells the truth.

name: Meikyû monogatari
summary_text: A trilogy of separate stories. In "Labyrinth labyrinthos", a girl and her cat enter a strange world. In "Running Man", a racer takes on the ultimate opponent. In "Construction Cancellation Order", a man must shut down worker robots.

name: The Citizen
summary_text: An Arab immigrant wins the American green card lottery, arriving in New York City on September 10, 2001.

name: Salvador
summary_text: A profile of anarchist and bank-robber Salvador Puig Antich, whose 1974 execution under the dictatorship of Francisco Franco ushered in a period of unrest that helped Spain transition to democracy.

name: Medea
summary_text: Medea is in Corinth with Jason and their two young sons. King Kreon wants to reward Jason for his exploits: he gives the hand of his daughter, Glauce, to Jason as well as the promise of the...                See full summary »

name: Hardbodies
summary_text: Frumpy singles Hunter, Rounder and Ashby rent a beach house to take advantage of the surf, sun and scores of available women. Not having what it takes, the men hire a sexy young surfer, Scotty, to help them meet girls.

name: Garden of Evil
summary_text: A trio of American adventurers marooned in rural Mexico are recruited by a beautiful woman to rescue her husband trapped in a cave in Apache territory.

name: Iru Mugan
summary_text: Love creates a new drug called Speed which was used by Hitler during WW2 to transform humans into superhumans. Agillan lost his wife and quits his job as RAW Agent.

name: A Babysitter's Guide to Monster Hunting
summary_text: A babysitter embarks on a mission to save a child who's been abducted by monsters.

name: El-Gazirah
summary_text: 'El Gezira' is a film about a community of Upper Egypt residents living in El Gezira (the Island). They have their own set of rules, ethics and traditions. They also plant drugs and buy ...                See full summary »

name: The Trip to Greece
summary_text: Actors Rob Brydon and Steve Coogan travel from Troy to Ithaca following in the footsteps of the Odysseus.

name: Das weiße Rauschen
summary_text: Kati, Jochen and Lukas take a trip on magic mushrooms. Lukas is not coming back.

name: Cheerleader Camp
summary_text: A group of cheerleaders become the targets of an unknown killer at a remote summer camp.

name: Nisos
summary_text: The death of a prominent citizen reveals the corruption that festers behind closed doors on a seemingly serene Greek island.

name: Kickboxer 4: The Aggressor
summary_text: David Sloan must travel to Mexico to save his wife from a savage drug lord who's also an old nemesis.

name: Zombie Nightmare
summary_text: A mother resorts to voodoo to get back at those who killed her son.

name: Piedone l'africano
summary_text: Commissary Rizzo in Napoli gets a message from a policeman from South Africa who wants to meet him. Immediatlz before this meeting the south African policeman is killed. Dying he shows ...                See full summary »

name: The Trailer Park Boys Christmas Special
summary_text: It's Christmas 1997.

name: Last Hero in China
summary_text: Jet Li stars in this comic spectacle as a Chinese "Robin Hood" who stumbles upon a kidnapping scheme after unwittingly opening a martial arts school next to a brothel!

name: The Beast Must Die
summary_text: Eight people have been invited to an island estate for the weekend. One of them is a werewolf. Can you guess which one?

name: Kuruvi
summary_text: Vetrivel and his friend engage in a cat-and-mouse game with a don named Koccha, to find his lost father.

name: Route 666
summary_text: A federal witness runs away and a team of government agents track him down, but when they take a shortcut on the return trip, they're attacked by zombies.

name: Yi jiu si er
summary_text: A deadly drought in 1942 takes its toll on central China's Henan province during the war against Japan.

name: The Substitute
summary_text: A group of sixth graders are convinced their new substitute teacher is actually a menacing alien.

name: Goodbye, Mr. Chips
summary_text: A shy, withdrawn English schoolteacher falls for a flashy showgirl.

name: Altitude
summary_text: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

name: Come Sweet Death
summary_text: Ex-detective Brenner wants to keep himself out of trouble but several murder cases and his ex-girlfriend Klara finally get him involved. But making decisions is not one his strengths.

name: Tim
summary_text: A somewhat mentally handicapped 20-year-old man works as a laborer, but everyone abuses his naiveté. A nice 40-year-old American woman hires him one day and they become close. However, the town and his family see her as predatory.

name: Girl Shy
summary_text: A shy young man who can't talk to women ventures out to publish a book full of fictional conquests, but finds true love along the way.

name: Vendetta
summary_text: A detective pushed beyond his limits will stop at nothing for vengeance. When his wife is killed by a criminal that he put away, Mason, a hard-nosed detective, deliberately gets arrested in...                See full summary »

name: Dark Summer
summary_text: A 17-year-old is on house arrest for the summer while his mother is away on business. A horrifying incident occurs leaving an ominous presence in the house.

name: No Man's Land: The Rise of Reeker
summary_text: A sheriff and his son chase casino robbers, only to find the all of them are being chased by something else.

name: Grimm Love
summary_text: In Germany, as graduate student Katie Armstrong researches cannibal killer Oliver Hagen for her thesis, she becomes obsessed with her subject and ultimately plunges into a lifestyle similar to Hagen's and the thousands of people like him.

name: Ibo ile Güllüsah
summary_text: A 9-year-old girl wishes to be kidnapped by an ex-con whom she dreams of a prince charming on white horse. This dull-witted ex-con man about town plays the role of the prince in her dreams lest she faces the bitter facts of real world.

name: The Ambulance
summary_text: A comic-book artist meets a woman on the NY streets, but after a quick flirtation, she suddenly collapses, and is picked-up by an old ambulance. He checks all the hospitals in the area, but the woman seems to have disappeared.

name: El Hijo
summary_text: Lorenzo, a 50 y.o. painter, is having a child with his new wife, Ingrid. She gets stranger and stranger - or he does. He claims, the baby's been switched.

name: Regular Show: The Movie
summary_text: To save the universe, and their friendship, Mordecai and Rigby must defeat an evil volleyball coach.

name: Robin Williams: Weapons of Self Destruction
summary_text: The master comedian performs in Washington DC and gives his wry observations about life, politics and his health.

name: My Brother's Wife
summary_text: Unable to get intimate with her husband of 10 years, a woman embarks on a steamy affair with his brother.

name: Xiu Xiu: The Sent-Down Girl
summary_text: Young teen girl Xiu Xiu is sent away to a remote corner of the Sichuan steppes for manual labor in 1975 (sending young people to there was a part of Cultural Revolution in China). A year ...                See full summary »

name: Drömkåken
summary_text: Göran, Tina and their two children buy a house in a suburb. It is in need of some repairs but Göran believes himself capable of repairing it himself with the help of a few cheap craftsmen. ...                See full summary »

name: The Best Man
summary_text: The 2 front runners for their party's presidential nomination, one principled and the other ruthless, vie for the former President's endorsement.

name: The Teahouse of the August Moon
summary_text: In post-WWII Japan, an American captain is brought in to help build a school, but the locals want a teahouse instead.

name: Broderskab
summary_text: Former Danish servicemen Lars and Jimmy are thrown together while training in a neo-Nazi group. Moving from hostility through to friendship and finally passion, events take a darker turn when it's discovered.

name: Stag Night
summary_text: Four men out on a STAG NIGHT in New York prematurely exit an underground train after the soon-to-be-best-man begins to hassle two women. Trapped at a deserted station these six adults ...                See full summary »

name: Dus
summary_text: A team of specialist must catch a terrorist before he carries out an attack.

name: Darna Mana Hai
summary_text: Seven friends, after their car breaks down in the middle of the night, find shelter and tell one another stories to kill time till dawn.

name: Nic smiesznego
summary_text: Tracks the hilariously bumbling, calamity-ridden life of director Adam Miauczynski. Both his career and his romantic relationships are suffering, but, since his total lack of common sense ...                See full summary »
